title: Senior-friendly tech: Digital roommates, animatronic pets and an airbag belt to prevent broken hips - USA TODAY
content: Senior-friendly tech: Digital roommates, animatronic pets and an airbag belt to prevent broken hips  USA TODAY
description: Soon, seniors will outnumber young people in the U.S. That means they'll need help with personal care. This tech was created with that need in mind.
